article_title: GOP States Pressured To Expand Medicaid Under Obamacare

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Pressure is building on some of the remaining 20 states that have yet to take advantage of federal dollars available to expand Medicaid programs for poor Americans under the Affordable Care Act. The federal government traditionally picked up a little more than half the cost of Medicaid. But funding under the health [...]
